MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L2 & L3 postcode areas of Liverpool. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  8:57am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of faulty equipment on the network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:56pm on 14th January 2021
